item.title: Major problems
item.dc:creator: @qw3rty qw3rty
item.description:
@qw3rty wrote:

ok ive made it a far way on this but i still have 2 errors plz continue helping me…

[code]
Item2.java:10: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable steelsl
location: class Item2
return steelsl[(int)(Math.random()*steels.length)];
^
NPCHandler.java:862: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomsteels()
location: class Item
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomsteels(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,
GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
^
NPCHandler.java:863: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Killedsteels
location: class Player
server.playerHandler.players[Play].Killedsteels = true;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors

xxx Isle Has Been Compiled SuccesFull !

Press any key to continue . . .[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2007, 01:59:04 PM[/size][hr]i changed steels into dragons to see if it did anything…
